t: Grimaldi Lighting LED Bulb, 3 Pack, 3 Watts, 260 Lumens, A15 Style Bulb, Warm White, Dimmable, 25W Equivalent - Amazon.com
s: I pulled the Grimaldi LED bulbs and put back the original 40W incandescent bulbs. Will try a different brand later. ... The bulbs themselves are fantastic, they're bright, small, and save a ton on energy. But I think they use the term "soft white" a little too loose in my personal opinion. I wanted a 2700k lightbulb ...
